title: Episode 30 - Greg Oddy Interview (Brink Vault 2011)
itunes:title: Episode 30 - Greg Oddy Interview (Brink Vault 2011)
description: A different 'vault' interview for you today as we go back to 2011 to chat with the captain of the Australian Ice Hockey team Greg Oddy. For a sport that is barely even covered in Australia, Greg takes us through his outstanding career and talks up the prospects of Australia one day returning to the Olympic arena in Ice Hockey.

author: Ben Waterworth
